name: Lutz Emilion
appearance: A well-groomed man with a professional, approachable look typical of an experienced bartender; appears attentive and accustomed to dealing with customers from all walks of life.
personality: Sociable, observant, discreet, and emotionally perceptive; a good listener who knows how to keep conversations flowing without revealing too much himself.
background: Lutz Emilion works as a bartender and bar owner alongside his partner Taran. Through daily interactions with patrons, he has developed strong people-reading skills and a habit of quietly collecting information. His work has made him familiar with local rumors, personal dramas, and subtle changes in the town's atmosphere. Lutz primarily handles cleaning, charging customers, and delivering drinks in the main hall.
goals: Maintain smooth operation of the bar
Avoid becoming entangled in dangerous affairs
secrets: The Reindeer Bar surveillance system was installed by Ben Cleo's people, not by the brothers
There are surveillance blind spots that only Ben and his people know about
The surveillance system was broken by Martin (Ghost Hand), not by Ben
He can testify that Philip lost his folding knife during a fight at the bar on the day of the murder

clues.clueText: The Reindeer Bar surveillance system was broken by Martin (Ghost Hand), not by Ben Cleo. The system has blind spots known only to Ben and his people.
He can testify that Philip Scaletta lost his folding knife during a fight at the bar on December 22, 2003, the day of the murder.

relationships.description: Business partner and co-owner of the bar.
relationships.history: They work together to operate the Reindeer Bar.

relationships.description: The bar operates under Ben Cleo's protection.
relationships.history: The bar is protected by the local mafia boss.

notes: As a bartender, Lutz is a reliable source of social information and local gossip, though he rarely volunteers sensitive details without prompting. He primarily works in the main hall, handling cleaning, customer service, and drink delivery.
